scripts.build: ng build ngx-pwa-local-storage --prod && copyfiles README.md LICENSE dist/ngx-pwa/local-storage && npm run schematics
scripts.test: npm run unit && npm run e2e
scripts.unit:windows-latest: ng test ngx-pwa-local-storage --watch false --browsers ChromeHeadless,FirefoxHeadless && ng test ngx-pwa-local-storage --watch false --browsers IE --tsConfig projects/ngx-pwa/local-storage/tsconfig.spec.ie.json
scripts.unit:windows-latest:private: ng test ngx-pwa-local-storage --watch false --browsers ChromePrivate,FirefoxPrivate && ng test ngx-pwa-local-storage --watch false --browsers IEPrivate --tsConfig projects/ngx-pwa/local-storage/tsconfig.spec.ie.json
scripts.e2e: npm run webdriver && npm run e2e:demo && npm run e2e:interoperability
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && cd projects/ngx-pwa/local-storage && npm version patch && cd ../../.. && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish dist/ngx-pwa/local-storage --access public && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && cd projects/ngx-pwa/local-storage && npm version minor && cd ../../.. && npm version minor && npm run build && npm publish dist/ngx-pwa/local-storage --access public && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run build && cd projects/ngx-pwa/local-storage && npm version major && cd ../../.. && npm version major && npm run build && npm publish dist/ngx-pwa/local-storage --access public && git push && git push --tags
